vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
καύχ-ημα,
Doric dialect καύχ-ᾱμα, ατος, τό, a boast, vaunt, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 subject of boasting, [NT+2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: something to boast about, boasting; pride, joy
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
something to boast about, boasting; pride, joy
a glorying, boasting, 1Cor. 5:6; a ground or matter of glorying or boasting, Rom. 4:2; joy, exultation, Phil. 1:26; complimentary testimony, 1Cor. 9:15, 16; 2Cor. 9:3
vocabInfos._es_Definition: jactancia, base para jactarse ; vanagloria, orgullo
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 自誇自豪
1a) 行為
1b) 言詞
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 自夸自豪
1a) 行为
1b) 言词
